native.query:
WITH UserProjectCounts AS (
    SELECT
        statename,
        createdby,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status = 'started' THEN projectid END) AS "Started Projects",
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status = 'inProgress' THEN projectid END) AS "In Progress Projects",
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status = 'submitted' THEN projectid END) AS "Submitted Projects"
    FROM projects
    WHERE 
        1=1
        [[ AND statename = {{state_param}} ]]
    GROUP BY statename, createdby
)
SELECT 
    statename AS "State",
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN "Started Projects" > 0 THEN createdby END) AS "Started Users",
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN "In Progress Projects" > 0 THEN createdby END) AS "In Progress Users",
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN "Submitted Projects" > 0 THEN createdby END) AS "Submitted Users"
FROM UserProjectCounts
GROUP BY statename
ORDER BY "Submitted Users" DESC;
